name: Moving Forward
description:
Only motorcyclists are able to piss off the police. I don't understand why they hate them so much. The road home will be long and difficult. You need to go around a lot of obstacles and traps. Get ready for anything!

Moving Forward - top view race on a motorcycle. You need to collect hearts, thereby making the trip much longer. Be careful, traps and oncoming patrols are trying to knock you down by pushing you off the road. Jumps will help you jump over obstacles. Good luck on the roads!

Game Features:
- Difficult passage
- Pixel Art
- Good settings
